name: Advanced TinyMCE Configuration
author: Andrew Ozz

sections.description:
This plugin is intended for more advanced users that would like to change the default TinyMCE configuration in WordPress.
It makes it very easy to add, remove or change all TinyMCE settings for the classic editor and for the classic block in the block editor.
sections.changelog:
1.6

Updated links to the TinyMCE documentation. Some cleanup and fixes.

1.5

Refreshed the styling and the UI, updated images. Removed warning about updating from TinyMCE 3.x to 4.x.

1.4

Minor fixes. Remove deprecated functions warning. Update links to the TinyMCE documentation.

1.3

Added “How-to”, example screenshots, and updated the help.

1.2

Added warning to check and update the TinyMCE settings after updating to WordPress 3.9/TinyMCE 4.0.

1.1

Minor cleanup, updated the help links, refreshed some of the JS and CSS on the settings screen.

1.0

Initial release.

short_description: Set advanced TinyMCE options for the classic block and classic editor.
description:
This plugin is intended for more advanced users that would like to change the default TinyMCE configuration in WordPress.
It makes it very easy to add, remove or change all TinyMCE settings for the classic editor and for the classic block in the block editor.
